question: M Chandrakasu, who passed away recently, was related to which field?
explanation: M Chandrakasu (67), the Former Puducherry Minister, has recently passed away in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. He represented Nedungad constituency in the outlying enclave of Karaikal for six terms. He was Agriculture Minister in the  All India N R Congress (AINRC) government formed by N Rangasamy in 2011.
